title: Computer Science Student Award Fund
description: To provide an annual student award for outstanding undergraduate scholars in Computer Science at CU Boulder that contribute to the life of the department, including service/participation in our student societies/clubs/competitions and community outreach.
marketingContent: To provide an annual student award for outstanding undergraduate scholars in Computer Science at CU Boulder that contribute to the life of the department, including service/participation in our student societies/clubs/competitions and community outreach.
